description:
Endless Mode for Sweet Bakery Tycoon is where your skills are put to the ultimate test against the clock! Each second counts and every dish matters.

Choose from 5, 10, or 15-minute sprints to showcase your breakfast-making prowess. It's a race against time to rack up the highest score possible!

Prepare for an adrenaline-pumping experience as you take orders, whip up dishes, and battle for the top score, all while the clock ticks down.

Each session is a new opportunity to outdo yourself and others!
name: Sweet Bakery Tycoon - DLC#4 - Endless Mode
